input.sentences: four of my friends entered a race for charity .
they were n't in the best shape | but it did n't matter .
they started off the race with speed .
the finish line was close | but they were n't all that concerned with winning .
output.sentences: It was finally the day of the race that my friends had entered.
Most of them were not in shape, but it didn't matter.
WHen it started the speed of those in the race was very fast.
After a few minutes my friend, Kim just simply walked for awhile.
winning wasn't important to my friends, and they only wanted to be able to cross the line, and finish.
